name: stockiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a body shape that is fairly short with wide shoulders and chest: Something about the stockiness of his build seemed familiar. The footballer has the stockiness and broad shoulders more associated with a boxer. See
stocky
More examplesFewer examplesHe was a man of unusual stockiness.Despite her stockiness, she is beautiful.Family photographs show a progression from normal stockiness at two, through childhood chubbiness, to frank fatness by ten.
